mapper.select:
SELECT count(a.CHANNEL_ORDER_ID) FROM fos_order_channel a LEFT JOIN fos_order b ON a.ORDER_ID = b.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN channel_info_v2 c ON a.CHANNEL_ID = c.ID WHERE 1=1
AND b.ORDER_NAME LIKE concat_ws('','%',#{ordername},'%')
AND c.FULL_NAME LIKE concat_ws('','%',#{channelname},'%')

SELECT a.CHANNEL_ORDER_ID as channelOrderId, a.ADVANCE_PAY_CONSUME as advancePayConsume, a.DATA_TIME as dataTime FROM fos_receive_order a WHERE a.CHANNEL_ORDER_ID = #{channelorderid} AND a.RECEIVE_STATUS = '2' AND a.ADVANCE_PAY_CONSUME > 0
